value:
$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Is this really your best?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Was that Eitri's voice?! Where did
it come from?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|This, too, is a wonder made possible
by the power of seiðjárn. I thought
we could speak less hastily like this.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Stop toying with us, Eitri! I already
told you I'll never forgive you!
Nothing you say can change that!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|That is a shame... And after I've
waited so long to officially meet
you, Princess Reginn...$k$pI had a feeling about you...from the
moment we met. Something about
you reminds me of him.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Him who?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|The first king of Niðavellir.$k$pHe whose courage rang out to even
the farthest realms, and whose wisdom
illuminated the way for his people.$k$pHe was a great man.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You talk as if you were there to
see it, Eitri—but Niðavellir was
founded thousands of years ago!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|I did see it. I served His Majesty.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|How is that possible?$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_DAMAGE0|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Eeeyaah! Wh-what is that?!$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Ah. I suppose apologies are in order.
It seems some of my failed attempts
at summoning have survived...$k$pIn hindsight, I should have kept
better track of such...mishaps.$k$p$Sbs150|
$WmMPID_フォルカ,ch09_24_Volka_M_Normal,Face|I'm Volke. I solve problems.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_08,0|$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|...Oh! I thought I'd noticed something
different with you, and there it is.$k$pYou have the Crown of the Dvergar,
don't you?$k$pI should hope so. It is yours by
right, after all.$k$pI designed it with so many intricate
mechanisms, all for this purpose.
I am glad to know it wasn't in vain.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|You made the Crown of the
Dvergar too?!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I knew it had been passed down
through generations of Niðavellir's
royal family, but—$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|BUT indeed. Some ruffians thought
they could take the throne, and the
people would fall in line. Not so!$k$pFortunately, I had the foresight to
include a mechanism that would
keep usurpers off the throne...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Then... Was Fáfnir's descent into
madness your doing too?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|In a manner of speaking. I never
thought some escaped reject would
go out and become king...$k$pThe sheer luck of him wearing the
crown, falling to his ruin, and then
delivering the true heir to me...$k$pI truly cannot express my delight.$k$pI wish I could thank him! Hahahaha!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We won't let you get away with
this, Eitri!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Anger|You killed my sister for THIS?!
Some dead king?! I'll...I'LL—$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|No need for hostility. I will happily
tell you anything you want to know...
Anything at all!$k$pOh, but you will have to find
me first... Good luck!$k$p$Sbs150|
